text: @SecPompeo @ernestofaraujo First you two should combat #COVID19  in your own countries, the situation is very bad over there. Then, you must live alone the venezuelan people, we don't nerd any "democratic transition", we just need peace and #NoMoreTrump #TrumpGenocide
